description: This header file declares internal functions related to device information parsing, XML handling, and object printing within the ohcm codebase for camera or device management.

methods.name: parseOhcmDeviceXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node to extract device information, assuming 'funcArg' is an ohcmDeviceInfo object.

methods.name: parseOhcmAudioListXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for a list of audio channels, assuming 'funcArg' is a linked list to hold ohcmAudioChannel objects.

methods.name: parseOhcmAudioXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for a single audio channel, assuming 'funcArg' is an ohcmAudioChannel object.

methods.name: appendOhcmAudioChannelListXml
methods.description: Generates XML for a list of audio channels and appends it to the provided root node.

methods.name: printOhcmAudioChannel
methods.description: Prints debug information for an ohcmAudioChannel object.

methods.name: parseOhcmVideoInputChannelListXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for a list of video inputs, assuming 'funcArg' is a linked list of ohcmVideoInput objects.

methods.name: parseOhcmVideoInputChannelXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for a single video input, assuming 'funcArg' is an ohcmVideoInput object.

methods.name: appendOhcmVideoInputChannelListXml
methods.description: Generates XML for a list of video inputs and appends it to the provided root node.

methods.name: parseOhcmStreamChannelListXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for a list of stream objects, assuming 'funcArg' is an icLinkedList.

methods.name: appendOhcmStreamChannelListXml
methods.description: Generates XML for a list of stream channels and appends it to the root node.

methods.name: parseOhcmMotionDetectionListXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for a list of motion detection settings, assuming 'funcArg' is a linked list.

methods.name: parseOhcmWirelessStatusXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for wireless status information of a network interface, assuming 'funcArg' is an ohcmWirelessStatus object.

methods.name: parseOhcmNetworkXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for information about a single network interface, assuming 'funcArg' is an ohcmNetworkInterface object.

methods.name: parseOhcmNetworkListXmlNode
methods.description: Parses an XML node for a list of network interfaces, assuming 'funcArg' is a linked list.

methods.name: appendOhcmNetworkInterfaceListXml
methods.description: Generates XML for a list of network interfaces and appends it to the root node.
